name: EWeapon Secret trigger
author: Alucard648
info: Triggers screen secrets, when hit by specific eweapon.
description: Triggers screen secrets, when hit by specific eweapon. Changes to next combo in list. In the demo, if the laser fired by boss hits green spot in the wall, secrets open.
setup: Place at trigger location. D0 - eweapon type ( EW_* from stdConstants.zh) D1 - minimum damaging power needed to trigger.
